Text: Thanks for uploading. You saved me a job. Watched this last night on tv and it was a delightful little interview. Look forward to the book!

You're welcome neil1966hardy :)

I try to upload any gnu atheist content I get hold of, especially Dawkins' stuff. Used to post all of it to a feed, but reactorfeed.com seems to be dead now. Do you know of any other sites where I can set up a similar torrent feed?
